summary: Requires ENB 0.113. This is a combination of several different ENB\'s I have tweaked and combined to give the, imo, perfect ENB setting. Many pretty FX effects, very low FPS hit. Also included is my tweaked ini files for better-than-Ultra quality with even more fps and less CTD\'s from scripting-heavy mods.
descriptionHtml:
Requires ENB 0.113. 
http://enbdev.com/mod_tesskyrim_v0113.htm
This is a combination of several different ENB\'s I have tweaked and combined to give the, imo, perfect ENB setting. FPS-hit is VERY important to me. I feel many other ENB-series sacrifice FPS for seemingly irrelevent things, or doesn\'t optimize their files well.

My ENB gives around 10 fps hit.

It includes:
Smoothed shadows (without fps hit)
Godrays
True sun
Parallax textures*
Lorefriendly palette
Very subtle FX lens-effect on fire etc

*Requires downloading of some texture packs, like the Project Parallax series and Parallax Rocks and Mountains 

Also includes my heavily tweaked ini files for better-than-Ultra quality but with even more fps. I use an 3-core AMD and a GTX460 card, and I get between 35-50 with my ENB activated, very rarely dropping to 30 fps. 
Those are based on another user, whose mod or name I can\'t find right now. I have then further tweaked them for even better quality and more fps. I have also included another tweak under the [Papyrus] setting, that severely reduce the amount of CTD from scripting intensive mods. With 120 esp files, I pretty much never get CTD anymore. Have ran the game for 6 hours without one. Remember to change the resolution in Skyrimprefs.ini to your own. I use 1920x1080
Remember to back up your own ini files first, if you feel the need to revert back.

I can also recommend Texture Optimizer for even less CTD\'s, if using many retextures etc
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12801/

[img]http://i.imgur.com/Zgdmf.jpg[/img]

[img]http://i.imgur.com/a8A4r.jpg[/img]

Please leave comment for improvements etc. Thank you.
author: MisterHamper
